segments.text: Well , we've been waiting for our luggage for about one hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of bag is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your room number and your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is room eleven-seven and my name is Terry Chen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me check . We delivered four bags to room 1106 , you friend's room about an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My friend's room ? Oh , I see . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
